text:
mailer-examples.war/mailer.jsp, line 11 should be
     <mt:mail server="<%-request.getParameter(\"server\") %>">
instead of
     <mt:mail server="<%-request.getParameter("server") %>">
Otherwise, the compiler complains
"mailer.jsp": Attribute server has no value at line 11, column 54
creator: Ignaz.Kohlbecker@aperto.de
